channel.title: [PI] Runetoplist script v2 [PI]
channel.description:
i have been working days now for finding out how this works, and finally i got it to work! and i was happy untill that a player used the command ::claim, wich made all the players of the server lagg out, and after 30 seconds they could log back in. does anyone know how to fix it?
[code]The last packet successfully received from the server was 1.344.662.672.572 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. i'll pay 40M rsps gold, i go first but i must see that you have vouches.
